sub_title: The Cheese Lover. Founder The British Cheese Centre  and The International Beer Bar Zürich. Now based in Arnhem (NL)
summary:
Notice to Financial Advisors. Do not call me!

After working for over 20 years in marketing and graphics in the London area I finally fulfilled my ambition to work with food. In 2007 I founded The British Cheese Centre in Zurich, importing, retailing and wholesaling the very best artisan farmhouse cheese from all over the United Kingdom. 

Breaking into such a protective market with such a foreign product was achieved by immense hard work, knowledge, passion and not a little natural British charm.

I sold the shop in 2020 (the business is still operating as The British Cheese Deli) and worked for 2 years in London at some of the best cheese companies in the UK. I am now located in the Netherlands and available for corporate tastings and workshops and media projects.

In the pipeline is a book about how I managed to create a new market selling British cheese to the Swiss "Confessions of a Kaesenova".

I am available for workshops and tastings for social groups, team building exercises and business groups and MBA programs. My subjects include British cheese of course as well "My Inspirational Business idea"​ and "How to sell to the Swiss!"

Specialties: Food handling, educational workshops, marketing, business talks.
